attributes.value: Is disgusted by tranquility and would that the world would constantly churn with noise and activity
Sees the pursuit of good craftsmanship as a total waste
Respects the development of skill
Sees competition as wasteful and silly
Sees war as a useful means to an end
Finds the pursuit of knowledge to be a waste of effort
Is quick to form negative views about things
Is often nervous
Is confident under pressure
Likes to brawl
Doesn't mind a little tumult and discord in day-to-day living
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Is somewhat scatterbrained
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Is private to the point of paranoia, unwilling to reveal even basic information about herself
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Forms only fleeting and rare emotional bonds with others
Dislikes obligations and will try to avoid being bound by them
Considers spending time alone much more important than associating with others
Actively avoids exciting or stressful situations
Agile
Quick to heal
Rarely sick
Poor focus
Bad intuition
A great deal of patience
A meager ability with social relationships
